prompt: Generate realistic text messages that represent non-spam (ham) content. These messages should reflect a broad spectrum of everyday communication, including personal conversations, legitimate business or service notifications, casual updates, and automated alerts. Vary the tone (friendly, professional, neutral, concerned), language style (informal chats, formal announcements, concise or detailed), and topics (meeting or appointment reminders, family or friend check-ins, order or delivery confirmations, bank transaction alerts, community or event updates). Include diverse formats like quick one-word replies, detailed explanations, friendly greetings, or automated system messages (e.g., OTP codes, subscription reminders). Ensure the content simulates authentic, non-malicious communication across different contexts, relationships, and platforms, avoiding any deceptive or promotional undertones.
response:
Hey! Just checking in to see how your day is going.  
Don't forget our meeting tomorrow at 10 AM. Let me know if you need to reschedule.  
Your package has been shipped and is on its way! Tracking number: 123456.  
Hi Mom, just wanted to let you know I made it to the hotel safely.  
Thanks for your support during the project! We really appreciate it.  
Can you remind me to pick up groceries after work?  
Your bank account has been credited $50 from your last payment.  
Looking forward to the family reunion next month! Let me know what dishes everyone is bringing.  
Just a quick note that our office will be closed on Friday for maintenance.  
Hey! Do you want to grab lunch tomorrow?  
Your subscription will renew on March 5th. Thank you for being with us!  
I’m running late, but I’ll be there in about 15 minutes.  
Just wanted to confirm our dinner plans for Saturday. Is 7 PM still good?  
Your OTP for login is 123456. Please enter it to proceed.  
I hope you’re feeling better! Let me know if you need anything.  
The team did a great job on the presentation! Thanks for your hard work.  
Reminder: The community cleanup event is this Sunday at 9 AM.  
Can you send me the notes from yesterday’s meeting? I missed a few points.  
Your order has been delivered. Please check your mailbox.  
Just a heads up, my phone will be off for the next few hours.  
Excited to see you at the concert next week!  
Thank you for your feedback! We’re always looking to improve.  
Your appointment is confirmed for Tuesday at 3 PM.  
How was your weekend? Did you get to relax?  
Please confirm your attendance at the workshop by the end of the week.  
Just finished the book you recommended. It was amazing!  
I’m at the coffee shop now. What would you like?  
Your current balance is $1,250. Thank you for banking with us!  
Looking forward to our game night! Don’t forget the snacks!  
I’ll call you back in a bit; I’m in a meeting right now.  
Your flight has been delayed by 30 minutes. More updates to follow.  
Hey, can you help me with my presentation later?  
I will be out of the office on vacation from July 1st to July 10th.  
Thanks for helping out with the project last week!  
Just a reminder, there’s a webinar on Thursday at 2 PM.  
I saw your message about Saturday; how about 6 PM?  
Your feedback survey is ready. Please take a moment to fill it out.  
Hope everything is going well with your new job!  
Your donation has been received. Thank you for your generosity!  
Can we reschedule our coffee date? Something came up.  
Your event registration is confirmed! Looking forward to seeing you there.  
Just wanted to say I’m thinking of you! Hope all is well.  
I’ll send over the files you requested by the end of the day.  
How’s the new puppy settling in?  
Your appointment has been moved to Friday at 2 PM.  
Thanks for the reminder about the bills!  
Can you let me know if you’ll be attending the meeting next week?  
I’m free to talk this afternoon if that works for you!  
Your password has been successfully changed.  
Looking forward to the weekend getaway! Let’s finalize our plans.  
I just wanted to check-in and see how your project is going.  
Thanks for a great dinner last night! Let’s do it again soon.  
Your car service appointment is confirmed for Thursday at 10 AM.
